summary: The document is a declassified record from the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act of 1992, focusing on the acquisition of books on espionage and counter-espionage. It details a request for specific titles in English or French, including works by communist defectors and historical accounts, to be obtained through local shops or commercial means. The urgency of the request underscores a targeted effort to compile intelligence or research materials.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act of 1992.
It highlights a request for books on espionage and counter-espionage, indicating an interest in historical and contemporary works on the subject.
Specific titles mentioned include 'Reseau de Spions', 'L'Histoire de Gestapo', and 'Her Majesty's Secret Service'.
The urgency and specificity of the request suggest a targeted effort to gather intelligence or research materials.
